description:
Great app for the steam deck, But i am getting double input when using the steam deck built in controller or a bluetooth PS5 controller. 

I am able to stop the double input when changing the steam input configuration, but the double input returns after restarting the app. 

Also when the external controller (ps5 duelsense) turns off due to inactity, after turning the contoller back on its no longer recognized by plex until i fully quit the app and restart it however i am able to navagate the SteamOS, so please looses function to the contollers if they sleep and reconnect.

This almost behaves like the Nividia Shield (android version) of Plex. The app/program isn't entirely stabile as there is Rando Freezes or iregularities. 

I would love to see stability updates as well as a PIP/shrink down the video that is playing back while you can browse your library.
perfect for your deck, just remember to set your controler profile
You should select the Keyboard & Mouse template for your steam controller configuration and you may want to tweak it from there but this works great once you do.
Sometimes the Steam Deck's controls work snd sometimes thry don't. Really annoying.

It works great for most things, but it doesn't seem to like the display on my Framework laptop. it has massive black bars on the top and bottom of the screen, that can't be removed by adjusting the settings.

Other than that, it's a straight clone of the tv interface ported to linux, which is wonderful for a lot of reasons. I like that it has perfectly acceptable mouse support dispite it's obvious origins.

Audio seems a little finicky, though, and I don't know why. sometimes it works without any problems, and others it doesn't even play audio, just screetches a harsh white-noise at my face.

In conclusion, it works, but with problems, and needs a little improvement.
summary: Works Great, but lacks support for Framework display

description:
Works great on SteamDeck. Works in both desktop and game mode. If you use it Game mode, you can force the mouse cursor interadtion by holding the STEAM button + right trackpad, but you really should download a custom community controller layout instead. 
Ledow's Plex HTCP Layout is excellent.
